sentence.Network_en: The lamb was a puny little thing.
Have grandiose aims but puny abilities, great ambition but little talent.
sentence.Network_cn: 眼高手低, 志大才疏.

sentence.Network_en: We did not meet again for ten years , by then , the rather puny boy had grown into a six - foot man, weighing 200 pounds.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们有10年没有见面了, 本来是一个小不点的男孩子,现在已长成6英尺高200磅重的大个儿了.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英文单词有关虚弱_百度知道 ... peaky adj. 虚弱的，消瘦的 puny adj. 弱小的，发育不良的 relent v. 减弱；动怜悯心.
punty 顶底杆puny 小的pup tent 小帐蓬
蓝宝词典 ... pungent adj. 辛辣的，刺激性的，严厉的 puny adj. 微小的，弱小的，微不足道的 purity n. 纯净，纯洁，纯度.
英语反义词 - 豆丁网 ... punctilious 小心谨慎的>不留心的，玩忽职守的 puny 微小的>巨大的 pusillanimous 胆小的>大胆的.

list.abs: grand words have given way to puny deeds .再宏伟的言语也得给微小的事情让步。
Antonio was a puny lad , and not strong enough to work ., 安东尼奥是个瘦小的小家伙 , 身体还不壮 , 还不能干活.
this puny guy applies for a job a lumberjack .有个弱小的男人申请了当伐木工人的工作。
绿巨人：“好一个弱不禁风的神（puny god）。” 　　洛基嘤嘤嘤地哭了…… 　　【二】 　　钢铁侠将核弹引向敌人堡垒，力尽倒下。
绿巨人：“可怜的神（puny god）。” 翻译成弱爆了比较好。洛基嘤嘤嘤地哭了。。。

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent. (as a noun denoting a younger or more junior person): phonetic spelling of puisne

entry.def: Someone or something that is puny is very small or weak.

example.ex: The resources at the central banks' disposal are simply too puny.
example.tran: 中央银行掌握的资金实在太少了。

means.word_mean: 2. (used especially of persons) of inferior size

auth_sentence.content: I wish I could see his puny brain overheat.
auth_sentence.res_content: I wish I could see his puny brain overheat.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I wish I could see his puny brain overheat.

auth_sentence.content: He was so puny that nobody thought he would live.
auth_sentence.res_content: He was so puny that nobody thought he would live.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He was so puny that nobody thought he would live.

auth_sentence.content: We think the costs are so puny to start with.

means.word_mean: 小于一般尺寸的,微不足道的

We did not meet again for ten years,by then,the rather puny boy had grown into a six-foot man,weighing 200 pounds.
